quizScreen.question: Question: What is the meaning of

quizResultDialog.title: Quiz Result
quizResultDialog.fail: You failed today's quiz, try again:

apiKeyDialog.title: Enter Google API Key
apiKeyDialog.description: To use AI word filling, you need a Google API key. You can get one
apiKeyDialog.note: Please note that this key is saved in localStorage and used only for this project.

infoDialog.title: Info
infoDialog.description3: An 80% score on the quiz is required to advance. Quiz content will remain the same until the next Quiz Day, regardless of the result. If you do not achieve 80% or higher, the tomorrow quiz content will not change.
infoDialog.description4: In Settings, modify Quiz Per Day and Repeat Quiz Day to generate quiz data.
infoDialog.description5: Example: Quiz Per Day is 10 and Repeat Quiz is 5
infoDialog.description7: This app is serverless. Your data is saved in localStorage. Data will be lost if you use incognito or clear browser data.
